# Special Data Formats and Course Wrap-up

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this chapter, you will be able to:

1. Read data from SAS, SPSS, and Stata files
2. Work with Excel files for reading and writing
3. Use helpful packages like `janitor` and `lubridate`
4. Apply the complete data science workflow
5. Create reproducible analysis pipelines
